entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Cardston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:28 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cardston 01:00 AM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Temperature: -2.4°C
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -3.9°C
Wind: N 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning this evening and ending before morning. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Local snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then light overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023
